activity.title: ohcnetwork/landing#63
activity.text: The solution to this can be adding few headers to next.config.mjs file which simply restrict other links to put your website in <iframe>. I did this in my system and tried to clickjack and it successfully restricted to let that happen. Can I submit PR?
